decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells that control the board. By utilizing cards like Anoint with Affliction and Go for the Throat to remove threats, while deploying powerful creatures like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Spyglass Siren to apply pressure, this Dimir Aggro deck aims to quickly establish dominance on the battlefield and pave the way to victory. The deck also benefits from card draw and manipulation through Enduring Curiosity and Faerie Mastermind to maintain tempo and outpace the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost creatures with evasion and taking advantage of the Azorius color combination to protect them with spells like Sheltered by Ghosts. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive creature base, while also leveraging cards like Zoetic Glyph and Leyline Axe to maximize damage output. By combining efficient creatures with protective enchantments and equipment, this Aggro deck aims to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent into a quick defeat.

The deck focuses on using the talents of the Thundertrap Trainer alongside cards like Stormchaser's Talent and Analyze the Pollen to create a powerful combo. By utilizing cards like Up the Beanstalk and Bushwhack, the deck can quickly build up resources and overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Valley Floodcaller and This Town Ain't Big Enough helps control the board while maintaining a strong offensive presence. The deck also utilizes a mix of different lands to ensure consistency in mana production.

This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures while utilizing powerful removal spells to control the board. The key strategy is to ramp up mana quickly with Llanowar Elves and other mana dorks, then play high-impact threats like Mosswood Dreadknight and Glissa Sunslayer. The deck also includes a mix of spot removal and board wipes to deal with any threats the opponent may have. Overall, the goal is to maintain pressure on the opponent and close out the game as quickly as possible with a combination of efficient creatures and removal spells.

The main concept of this deck is to establish board control and manipulate resources using cards like Get Lost, Temporary Lockdown, and Leyline Binding. It also focuses on generating value through cards like Meticulous Archive and Herd Migration, while utilizing powerful creatures like Overlord of the Floodpits and Overlord of the Mistmoors to maintain dominance on the battlefield. Additionally, the deck includes mana fixing with Floodfarm Verge and Hushwood Verge, and card advantage with cards like Up the Beanstalk and Zur, Eternal Schemer.

The deck focuses on quickly getting powerful creatures into the graveyard and then bringing them back to the battlefield using spells like Zombify. The creatures in the deck have strong abilities and can quickly take over the game once they are reanimated. Cards like Bitter Triumph and The Cruelty of Gix help control the board while setting up the combo. The key strategy is to efficiently fill the graveyard with key creatures and then bring them back to overwhelm the opponent.
